description: Represent clients in civil litigation matters including contract disputes, property disputes, and consumer cases. Draft pleadings, appear in court, and negotiate settlements on behalf of clients.
responsibilities: Conduct legal research and prepare case strategies; draft pleadings, affidavits, and legal briefs; appear before district and high courts; handle client consultations and manage case files; negotiate settlements and compromises; liaise with opposing counsel and court staff; maintain case documentation and compliance.
